<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Standard">[Acidic Burst](/Spells.aspx?ID=565)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Acid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=3" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 106 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Deity**
[Geryon](/Deities.aspx?ID=67)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Area** 5-foot emanation

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex

</row>

</column>

---

You create a shell of acid around yourself that immediately bursts outward, dealing 2d6 acid damage to each creature in the area.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The damage increases by 2d6.
name: Acidic Burst
